root.name: Ronaldo V-Football
root.description: Ever wanted to play football like a Brazilian? Not in the US? Yes? Well that's why Ronaldo teamed up with Infogrames and developer Power and Magic Development to bring you the greatest soccer experience of the year 2000. (Not released in the US).The games features 64 international teams (with only some licensed players) and multiple play modes, including:Arcade ModeSimulation ModeThe game also features 15 different stadiums, with unique characteristics specific to each player, top graphics and AI. "Feel the Latino heat, Brazilian football just got way hotter!"
